class.name: BlackboardPlan
class.brief_description: Stores and manages variables that will be used in constructing new [Blackboard] instances.

method.name: create_blackboard
method.description: Constructs a new instance of a [Blackboard] using this plan.

method.name: populate_blackboard
method.description: Populates [param p_blackboard] with the variables from this plan. If [param p_override] is [code]true[/code], existing variables with the same names will be overwritten.
